experience: You and Dimitri both know Eric Keosky-Smith, Pamela Metivier, and 260 others
You both worked at Charles Schwab
Dimitri worked at Charles Schwab before you started
I just added a SlideShare to my profile
Hoping this article helps #agile teams considering #scrumban to navigate that decision, or reinforce their usage of #scrum or #kanban as their ideal methodology. Enjoy!

Torak is a provider of Agile / Lean / DevOps coaching and training services. We are a company comprised of  coaches focused on knowledge sharing and high levels of accountability to achieve greater results. We provide services to achieve the goals of our clients, which includes, facilitating human interactions that drive positive behaviors towards a common goal. Torak also collaborates with AgileTestingFramework.com an open source framework to share knowledge about the best ways to improve your Agile Testing practices within a DevOps environment.Our happy clients include: American Express, Best Western International, Charles Schwab, Choice Hotels International, CSAA Insurance Group, First Solar, Morgan Stanley, LifeLock, Mayo Clinic, Phoenix Children's Hospital, Wolters Kluwer.

We are Kanban and Agile experts seeking better ways to share, teach and implement new ways of working in all environments, not just manufacturing for Kanban and software for Agile.We focus on increasing results, reducing cost and improving customer satisfaction. Our online Kanban tool and templates provide everything you need to significantly improve the way you work, communicate and GET WORK DONE!www.kanbanzone.com

Suping Joe
Senior Program Manager,  PSM I (Prof Scrum Master)
December 21, 2016, Suping was a client of Dimitri’s

I had the pleasure of meeting Dimitri during one of the Agile Boot camp training courses he conducted at American Express and later when he was engaged as a consultant advising the Agile transformation in the Technology org, as teams were adopting Scrum and Kanban practices.  In addition to being a highly effective and knowledgeable trainer, Dimitri is a consummate Agile practitioner.  He is extremely pragmatic, candid and connects personally with those he comes in contact with.  His guidance and mentorship has been invaluable to me.

summary: I am a coach and the president of Torak, Inc. where we help organizations improve using Agile and Lean Thinking philosophies. Being a fanatic of continuous improvement, I co-founded KanbanZone.com to provide the most innovative visual process management tool. It has been a pleasure to provide coaching for these great clients : American Express, Charles Schwab, Bank of America, Morgan Stanley, Best Western, Choice Hotels, JDA Software, LifeLock, First Solar, Mayo Clinic and Phoenix Children's Hospital.
name: Dimitri Ponomareff
title: Agile Coach & Co-Founder of KanbanZone.com
